alert.note: Alert for Hendricks; Marion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:25PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hendricks and southwestern Marion Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 825 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Speedway, or 9 miles west of Indianapolis, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Speedway around 830 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 110 and 111. Interstate 70 between mile markers 72 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
